name: LikeLoveHate
overview: React to media with Like, Love, or Hate
description: Adds Like, Love, and Hate reaction buttons to media item detail pages using Material Design icons.

versions.changelog:
## Whats New

- **Header Button Row** â€” Reaction icons sit alongside Play, Trailer, Watched, and Favorite in the top action bar on item detail pages
- **Video Player OSD** â€” Reaction icons appear in the bottom control bar while watching, next to Subtitles and Favorite

### Synced State
All three locations (header row, video player, detail panel) stay in sync â€” clicking a reaction anywhere updates it everywhere.

### Existing Panel Unchanged
The detailed Reactions section below the item info (with counts, usernames, and timestamps) remains in place.
